title: v1.6.3.4-v7 Hydration Fixes
details:
v1.6.3.4-v7 added critical hydration architecture fixes:
1. Real QuickTabWindow Hydration - _hydrateMinimizedTab() creates actual instances via createQuickTabWindow() factory
2. Instance Validation Pattern - Check typeof tabWindow.render === 'function' before operations
3. URL Validation in Render - UICoordinator validates URL before _createWindow()
4. Try/Finally Lock Pattern - Guaranteed lock cleanup in VisibilityHandler
5. Handler Return Objects - handleMinimize/handleRestore return { success, error }
6. State Events on Hydration - emit state:added for hydrated tabs
7. RENDER_COOLDOWN_MS = 1000 constant in UICoordinator prevents duplicate renders
